column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////My visit to common bond was a very impulsive one. My brother and I were on our way to a different breakfast restaurant
column2: but saw Common Bond packed so we decided to give it a try. First impression as we walked in was new age and Kind of pretentious
column3: however all of the workers were extreme nice and patient. My brother ordered the chicken torta and I ordered the pork belly. Both dishes were amazing! The pork belly was very rich and was like nothing I have had before. I alway ordered their signature pastry. I don't remember what it's called
column4: but it's an extra buttery and sugary croissant
column5: and it is to die for. The coffee is delicious too and perfectly roasted. All in all the atmosphere is incredible along with the staff and food. Common Bond is a must.
